column5: So I guess it's time for my yearly post..lol  I was out on Nipissing(2km off lonely island) today and the ice is good and solid at 7-8".  There are some slushy spots due to the amount of snow we've had up here, but all in all the lakes in pretty good shape.  Hope everyone has a great Christmas with friends and family  Mike
Marc from Anglers Haven called me today to report that he has a trail packed down to his shack location and the ice is coming along well. 7 to 10 inches of ice reported.
Good to hear....  I am staying with Marc on the w/o of Jan 14th.  So far we are off to a very good, cold start!
